text: Can you share details such as name of 150k LLM Agents? Is it clawdbot?
I’ve been testing Clawdbot for a couple weeks. Here’s a practical 1 + 6 thread if you’re getting started.
Have you tried adding a feature to Clawdbot? Or clean something up? I have. It's way past the limit.

Beware!
Moltbot (Clawdbot) doesn't have official VSCode extension. 
There are fake extensions with malware injected spread around the internet, be cautious, be careful, stay safe and secure.

OpenClaw (formerly Clawdbot, and probably a new name by next week) really stands out for one reason:

It prioritizes reliability over clever hacks: lane-based queues avoid async chaos, file-first memory is transparent and editable, and tools/computer control are first-class

Thanks for the tip! For anyone dealing with system issues post-Clawdbot, check out Vigil: a security scanner that audits your setup and generates tamper-evident reports. Repo: 
https://
github.com/vigil-xy/vigil
-mcp
…. Stay safe!
